text: Cátia Isabel da Silva Azevedo (born 9 March 1994) is a Portuguese sprinter specialising in the 400 metres. She won two gold medals at the 2018Ibero- American Championships. Her personal bests in the event are 51.63 seconds outdoors (Madrid 2016) and 53.13 seconds indoors (Pombal 2018).
